DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the cardiac safety of inhaled indacaterol with that of placebo and oral moxifloxacin.
DOC.criteria: Healthy, nonsmoking Body mass index (BMI) 18.532 kg/m2 Body weight at least 50 kg Recent/concurrent use of concomitant medications (except acetaminophen) Recent participation in other clinical trials Recent donation or loss of blood History/presence of a range of medical conditions, including electrocardiographic (ECG) abnormalities, diabetes mellitus, hyperthyroidism and impaired renal function Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
